for "sword." :)

Tatsuko

Anata ga dekiru koto wo Watashi mo yaritogetai
Yume wa kanau wa, kitto. Tooku, Takaku
Homete kureru ka na? Yasashii koe de
Sukoshi HEART ga uzuku no
Tada yuuki o dasu dake de, yume no tsuzuki genjitsu ni naru
Michishirube wa anata dake. Senobi o shite oikakete yuku wa

messages.subject: Nakajima Nobori Lecture (Posts at a Japanese msgboard)
messages.msgSnippet: http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs I had http://www.nifty.com/globalgate translate it...very interesting...a mention of Nakajima Nobori and Hijikata s
messages.messageBody:
http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs
I had http://www.nifty.com/globalgate translate it...very
interesting...a mention of Nakajima Nobori and Hijikata's parent's
house reporting about the situation in Hakodate.
Sadly, nifty was not too clear about anything else.
